A. I go up and turn right.  
B. I descend and turn right.  
C. I fly forward while rising.  
D. I turn left and descend.  
E. I rotate the camera downward and fly forward.

This will help in gaining the necessary altitude to fly over the opposite road and continue towards the mountains. Options A, B, D, and E do not align as closely with the given instructions as they involve turning or descending, which are not required at this stage.
